dork-login.query: site:example.com inurl:admin OR site:example.com inurl:login OR site:example.com inurl:wp-admin OR site:example.com inurl:wp-login OR site:example.com inurl:portal OR site:example.com inurl:member OR site:example.com inurl:dashboard OR site:example.com inurl:auth OR site:example.com inurl:ForgotPassword OR site:example.com inurl:signup

dork-registration.query: site:example.com (intext:"signup" OR intext:"Create Account" OR intext:"Create a Account" OR intext:"Create an account" OR intext:"Criar conta" OR intext:"cadastrar conta")

dork-apis.query: site:example.com (inurl:*/rest OR inurl:*/v1 OR inurl:*/v2 OR inurl:*/v3)

dork-filetype.query: site:example.com filetype:pdf OR site:example.com filetype:doc OR site:example.com filetype:docx OR site:example.com filetype:xls OR site:example.com filetype:xlsx OR site:example.com filetype:ppt OR site:example.com filetype:pptx

dork-apidocs.query: site:example.com inurl:apidocs OR site:example.com inurl:api-docs OR site:example.com inurl:swagger OR site:example.com inurl:api-explorer

dork-cloud-amazon.query: example.com site:s3.amazonaws.com OR example.com site:*.s3.amazonaws.com OR example.com site:s3-external-1.amazonaws.com OR example.com site:s3.dualstack.us-east-1.amazonaws.com

dork-cloud-microsoft.query: example.com site:blob.core.windows.net OR example.com site:dev.azure.com OR example.com site:sharepoint.com OR example.com site:onedrive.live.com

dork-cloud-google.query: example.com site:googleapis.com OR example.com site:drive.google.com OR example.com site:docs.google.com inurl:"/d/" OR site:firebaseio.com OR example.com site:storage.googleapis.com

dork-cloud-generic.query: example.com site:digitaloceanspaces.com OR example.com site:dropbox.com/s OR example.com site:box.com/s

dork-fileupload.query: site:example.com "selecionar arquivo" OR site:example.com "choose file" OR site:example.com "upload"

dork-internalinfo.query: site:example.com intext:"CONFIDENTIAL" OR site:example.com intext:"INTERNAL" OR site:example.com intext:"RESTRICTED"
